name: TACO CLUB BERRITO
description: The best Mexican food in San Diego came from the hole-in-the-wall taco stands

name: Beef Burger
description: A food, typically considered a sandwich, consisting of one or more cooked patties—usually ground meat, typically beef—placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun. The patty may be pan fried, grilled, smoked or flame broiled

name: Chicken Curry
description: Chicken tikka masala is a dish consisting of roasted marinated chicken chunks (chicken tikka) in spiced curry sauce. The curry is usually creamy and orange-coloured

name: Chaow mein
description: The fried noodles then cook with the other components so the flavors marry, the fried crispy noodles soften slightly in the sauce, and the fried taste of the noodles permeates the whole dish. This gives chow mein it's characteristic chewy texture and fried flavor.

name: Chicken Burger
description: A food, typically considered a sandwich, consisting of one or more cooked patties—usually ground meat, typically beef—placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun. The patty may be pan fried, grilled, smoked or flame broiled

name: Kacchi
description: The term 'kacchi' means 'raw' but don't worry, you won't be served uncooked biryani. Rather, the kacchi-style of cooking, which is also known as kacchi yeqni, refers to the method of cooking all the raw elements together in one pot.
